mapper.update: update cart set ctCount=#{ctCount} where productCode=#{productCode} and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, productCode, mainSubject, thumbnail, qty, qty*price as orgprice, qty*price*discountRate/100 as dcprice ,qty*(price-price*discountRate/100) as price from orderDetails join product using (productCode) join orderInfo using (orderNumber) where orderNumber = ${ordernumber}
